item.title: Theme Accessibility - Quick check
item.description: Some quick audit on color contrasts. The current theme I’m using is Bilberry-hugo-theme. This post will only focus on color contrasts issue for a few reasons: - It can be visually perceived - It is one of the area that automated checker are better at. - Small area of focus so that I have room for tips and takeaway. Get started with a quick check I ran a quick Accessibility Test with WAVE Accessibility Checker(it comes as a convenient browser extension for Chrome Browser).

item.title: Fun with Golang image package

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Aka the real first post After much delay for many reasons (lack of experience, material, imposter syndrome, etc…). I finally decided to launch my personal blog. I’m hoping to have this space to share my knowledge, experience and also be a playground for myself. This blog is powered by Hugo - an open-source static site generator written in Golang language. Pros are plenty for me: Written in my favorite programming language.
